sections: Check out this numbers matching, factory original classic SUV!
The mid 1970â€™s were arguably one of the most pivotal times in the automotive world. With an incredible lineup of great and innovative minds on hand,

positioned itself to shape the course of the industry with the creation of some of the most iconic vehicles ever made. Icons for the road, icons for the track, and one for any course or terrain imaginable:

, this stunning red and white topped 1974 Ford Bronco features what is, incredibly, the original 302 V8, backed by a manual transmission, for your driving pleasure. With everything super clean and in its place in the engine bay, the engine even has the original, correct stickers.
The interior continues with the same F

, and remains in excellent condition - even featuring the factory air conditioning, that still blows cold, and power steering. Likewise, the exterior is also very thoughtfully done with a bright color scheme that calls the eye, is no different than when this Bronco rolled off the lot.

, you can bid on this classic 1974 Ford Bronco. The vintage off-roader is up for sale with only 49,000 miles on the clock, and lots of life left in it. Considering the incredible condition, vintage feel and great drivability this Bronco seems to be well worth the current bid of $42,000, and won't last long.
